name: Peach Trees 3D
description:
Unreal Engine 4

  • controls: WSDA - moveing; Left mouse button - to use screen controls
  • Need to find a way from the level or collect enough crystals to teleport
  • Cool lighting effects!
  • 6 levels filled with traps and challenges.
  • Use environment to fight obstaacles.
  • Top-Down Action-Puzzle Game
  • Using Physics to solve puzzles
